scripts.install-all-deps: npm i && concurrently "npm run backend-install" "npm run frontend-install"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.rebuild-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run rebuild-prod"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run prod"
